title: All I can do is ping, nothing works...
body: Not sure why... Just ruined a game for me.

replies.body: Can you clarify what's going on? Is it as if none of your keybindings are working or are you experiencing a message such as *attempting to reconnect* or something that delays your actions?
It's a bug that happens when you tab out and come back in. I don't remember how to fix it from top of my head.

> [{quoted}](name=Call Me JAS,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5AqjewM6,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-18T03:46:36.799+0000)
>
> It's a bug that happens when you tab out and come back in. I don't remember how to fix it from top of my head.

Could be, I do tab out a bit, have been watching worlds while the game loads.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5AqjewM6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-18T03:26:46.706+0000)
>
> Can you clarify what's going on? Is it as if none of your keybindings are working or are you experiencing a message such as *attempting to reconnect* or something that delays your actions?

I get into game. My mouse only scrolls up... scrolling down doesn't work. I can't buy items. When I try to left or right click all it does is ping.  I can't choose skills, I can't do much of anything except ping.  I kind of hit every button on my keyboard and it sometimes works itself out.  Other times I just close and restart the program but it happens a LOT.

Hmm, there may be a background app causing this to happen. I recommend [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) and avoiding *Alt+Tabbing* for a match to see if this still happens.

Let me know if anything's changed.
